message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a great deal for you considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $11,000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about $13,000? That's still a good deal for you considering the value of the product, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle?
